Package com.collective.celos

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExternalService
    Execution engine for workflows.
    ExternalStatus
    Status of a workflow in an external service.
    PropertiesGenerator
    This one is tricky to explain.
    Schedule
    Determines the times at which a workflow is supposed to run.
    SchedulingStrategy
    A scheduling strategy determines the order in which slots of a workflow are executed.
    StateDatabase  
    StateDatabaseConnection
    Stores all state needed by the scheduler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BucketID  
    CelosClient
    Utility class to talk to the Celos server HTTP API.
    Constants
    Miscellaneous constants.
    CronSchedule
    Schedule implementation that uses cron-like syntax.
    DatabaseName
    Utility class for Celos CI that wraps a database name.
    DependentSchedule
    Makes a workflow use the same schedule as another workflow.
    FileSystemStateDatabase
    Brutally simple persistent implementation of StateDatabase that stores slot states as JSON files in the file system.
    HourlySchedule
    Simple schedule for hourly execution.
    JDBCStateDatabase  
    JettyServer
    Common Jetty code for Celos server and Celos UI.
    JSConfigParser
    Massively misnamed, this is in fact a JavaScript evaluator.
    MinutelySchedule
    Simple schedule for - ahem - minutely execution.
    OozieExternalService
    Oozie external service.
    OozieExternalStatus
    Status of Oozie execution of a workflow.
    RegisterKey  
    RerunState  
    ScheduledTime
    Time of a workflow run in UTC.
    ScheduledTimeFormatter
    Formatting utilities for times.
    Scheduler
    Master control program.
    SchedulerConfiguration
    Reads configuration and database from filesystem at well-known paths.
    SerialSchedulingStrategy
    Submits workflow slots oldest first with a configurable concurrency level.
    SlotID
    A single execution of a workflow at a given time.
    SlotState
    The execution status of a slot.
    SlotStateStatusPredicate
    Ivor who's a Scala wonk did this.
    TrivialSchedulingStrategy
    Trivial scheduling strategy that submits as many ready jobs as possible in parallel.
    Util
    The place for everything that doesn't fit anywhere else.
    ValueObject
    Provides automatic equals, hashCode, and toString for simple objects.
    Workflow
    A periodical task.
    WorkflowConfiguration
    The set of all workflows loaded into the scheduler.
    WorkflowConfigurationParser
    Reads a set of JS files from a directory and creates a WorkflowConfiguration.
    WorkflowID
    Uniquely identifies a workflow.
    WorkflowInfo
    Metadata such as URL and authors of a workflow.
    WorkflowInfo.ContactsInfo  
    WorkflowStatus
    Bean returned by HTTP API that contains information about a workflow and a subset of its slots.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SlotState.Status  
    SlotState.StatusType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExternalServiceException
    Exception from external service.
